Hi there!
 
At the moment, Blizzard has enough on its plate that we haven't worried
about directly suggesting they make a Gladiator game :) But if you notice
Gladiator-style influences on the games that come out, don't be surprised!
:)
 
--Tom

-----Original Message-----
From: wes1212000 [mailto:WRA_@...]
Sent: Monday, August 05, 2002 7:55 AM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [gladiator] I was thinking....


I was just wondering if FSGames ever presented Glad:BF to Blizzard, 
seeing as how they work for them and all now. As far as I know, there 
has yet to be any game devolped even remotly similiar to Gladiatar, 
and just imagine all the things you could do with a publisher like 
Blizzard backing you. I mean, there would be B.net Gladiator, which 
would be so cool. I can just see now like 16 people in a game, all 
controlling one character be it as a co-op through the campaign, a 
team pvp, or a massive free for all. I mean, you'd probably need to 
redo the grapchics from scartch, but any storyline you had you could 
still keep, and if you'd already had the music composed it may need 
to be touched up but would still work. Well, just thought I'd ask :P 
Btw, anyone who is waiting for Warcraft 3 to drop, I just got it for 
42.45 from www.dirtcheapsoftware.com . I think someone else had it as 
cheap, but they had a lower merchant rating, but pricegrabber.com is 
place to check (heh, all the other Gamespy users are going to be 
duhing me right about now.)



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
